section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules necessary to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Economic development zones, eligibility for tax incentives, see ยง 6-1504.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in ยง 47-1808.09.
